Posts.Content: Teddymom9111 wrote: hi, new here....I have been getting yearly MRIs for about 3-4 years after I decided to start seeing a breast doctor after I had a mammo with an 'architectural distortion." It resolved and June 2016 MRI it was stable and mammo was fine. Last week I had my MRI and they found a 3.2 cm non mass enhancement and another one1.2cm nearby. Dr thinks this is fibrocystic tissue but still wants a biopsy. How could something stable grow all of a sudden? Is 3.2 big? Can DCIS be that large andstill contained in the duct? She said DCIS was the next highest likelihood. I have had pain at the sites for the last 2 months and very very worried. Anyone had a non mass enhancement turn out to be fibrocystic tissue? How do I get through this waiting Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 3.2 cm non mass enhancement - biopsy Wednesday Teddymom9111 dasill
